site.name: RustFS
site.tagline: High-performance distributed object storage system built with Rust
site.description: RustFS is a high-performance, unlimited scaling, secure and reliable distributed storage system built with Rust, S3 protocol compatible, MinIO alternative, supporting multi-cloud storage.
site.keywords: RustFS, distributed storage, cloud storage, S3 compatible, high performance, open source, MinIO alternative
site.author: RustFS Team
site.title_home: RustFS - High-Performance Distributed Storage System Built with Rust
site.description_home: RustFS is a high-performance, unlimited scaling, secure and reliable distributed storage system built with Rust, S3 protocol compatible, supporting multi-cloud storage.
site.description_download: Download RustFS, supporting Docker, Linux, macOS, Windows and other platforms, quickly deploy your distributed storage system.
site.description_features: Learn about RustFS core features: high performance, unlimited scaling, multi-cloud support, S3 compatibility, open source and more.
site.description_about: RustFS is a trusted open source distributed storage solution with over 1500+ software protocol compatibility adaptations.

hero.description: RustFS is developed with the popular and secure Rust language, compatible with S3 protocol. Suitable for AI/ML, massive data storage, big data, internet, industrial and confidential storage scenarios. Nearly free to use. Follows Apache 2 license, supports domestic confidential devices and systems.
hero.subtitle: Trusted open-source software with over 1500+ software protocol compatibility adaptations

multiCloud.Multi-cloud object storage allows enterp: Multi-cloud object storage allows enterprises to build AWS S3-compatible data infrastructure on any cloud. The result is a consistent, portable interface for data and applications - meaning you can run anywhere, from edge to public cloud, without changing a line of code.
multiCloud.RustFS is powered by Kubernetes and prov: RustFS is powered by Kubernetes and provides scalable, secure, S3-compatible object storage for every public cloud. Free yourself from vendor lock-in and treat clouds for what they are - commodity compute, network, and drives.
multiCloud.From OpenShift to Tanzu, RustFS is the o: From OpenShift to Tanzu, RustFS is the only object storage that is part of the infrastructure foundation of leading Kubernetes distributions. With its massive portfolio of integrated applications, RustFS completes the software-defined picture.
multiCloud.The complete RustFS multi-cloud storage: The complete RustFS multi-cloud storage binary is less than 100MB, capable of powering object storage anywhere - from ARM SOCs, 5G POPs, and edge cache devices to mini data centers. This is why RustFS dominates the edge storage market.
